name: Salomon Brigade+ Helmet - Unisex
description: The Brigade helmet has been around for a while, but this version is one of the best equipped. Packing style and safety, the Brigade+ uses Salomon's EPS4D foam with EPP inserts to protect your head against impacts and is approved for both cycling and snowsports. The Active ventilation system lets you tune the amount of airflow you need to stay comfortable and keep your goggles free of fog. The removable and washable liner offers smell-free warmth during long runs down snowy slopes, while the integrated summer pads keeps you comfortable on summer rides around town.Injected ABS Shell is used for its long-lasting durability and ding-resistant strength.EPS4D liner with EPP inserts provides high energy absorption on impact.Active ventilation lets you tune the amount of airflow to keep you comfortable.Integrated Custom Dial adjustment provides a precise and comfortable fit.Removable earpads are audio system–compatible.Removable washable liner.
